DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , reactogenicity immunogenicity booster dose GSK Biologicals ' pneumococcal conjugate vaccine compare Prevenar™ give 12-18 mo age child prim either pneumococcal vaccine Prevenar™ study 105553 . Antibody persistence evaluate 8-14 mo completion 3-dose immunization course study 105553 . The immune response booster dose GSK Biologicals ' pneumococcal conjugate vaccine also evaluate give 12-18 mo subject prim GSK Biologicals ' vaccine Prevenar™ . The study 3 group . 1 group child prim GSK Biologicals ' pneumococcal conjugate vaccine receive booster dose vaccine . 2nd group child prim Prevenar™ receive booster dose Prevenar™ ( control group ) . 3rd group child prim Prevenar™ receive booster dose GSK Biologicals ' pneumococcal conjugate vaccine . All child receive concomitantly booster dose DTPa-HBV-IPV/Hib vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Study Booster Dose GSK Biologicals ' 10-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine .
DOC.criteria: healthy male female , 12 18 month age time vaccination , receive least one dose either pneumococcal conjugate vaccine Prevenar™ study 105553 write informed consent obtain parent/guardian subject . use investigational nonregistered drug vaccine study vaccine within 30 day precede vaccination , plan use entire study period ( active phase safety followup ) . Planned administration/ administration vaccine foreseen study protocol period start one month vaccination Visit 2 . Administration additional pneumococcal vaccine DTPacombined vaccine since end study 105553 . Children history seizures neurological disease , allergic disease , immunosuppressive immunodeficient condition .
